skillTree.localised_description: True horses no longer, Dark Magic corrupts the finest Elven steeds and turns them into black-flanked killers.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: Magnificent chariots, gifted to those who have impressed with their devotion, bravery and prowess in battle.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: It is easy to favour Hekarti - who pays close attention to Elven desires - over Atharti, but only the foolish allow that to happen.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +8
	(own army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Bloody-handed God watches over his disciples.
Magic's dark mistress has a care for her dutiful acolytes.
Once, Furion tried to shatter the High Elven vortex. He failed, but the skills that he learned in the attempt are still with him to this day.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: -15
	(enemy armies in local province)

skillTree.localised_description: When Furion is not slaving away over creating magical items or contemplating his burning hatred of the "High" Elves, he is efficiently and effectively assisting Malekith in the governing of Naggaroth. And there are few who would dare to cross his path.

effects.description:
On turn start, Lords in this character's region have a chance to gain 1 loyalty
	(local region)

skillTree.localised_description: Furion has stood by Malekith's side since before the fall of Nagarythe, and has long leant his magic to the aide of the Witch King. Whenever the two enter the field of battle together, the ruler of Naggaroth finds his already substantial magical prowess enhanced even further.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for Lore of Dark Magic
	(Lord's army if faction leader)

Cooldown: -20% to Lore of Dark Magic spells
	(Lord's army if faction leader)

target_if: Not on or below a platform
Not on or below a platform

skillTree.localised_description: Dark Magic is destruction incarnate - even its most basic precepts are corrosive to the mind, body and soul. Few tomes containing its secrets therefore exist, for mere paper and papyrus smoulder to naught within decades of being inked with such sigils. The Tome of Furion is a rare exception to this rule. Its page are flayed Orc-hide, but the book endures its burdens thanks only to the carefully layered enchantments Furion bound into its covers. The letters inscribed within writhe and shift like living creatures, and the pages are warm to the touch even in the dead of winter.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Power of Darkness"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Piercing Bolts of Burning Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Chillwind Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Flaming Sword of Rhuin Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Burning Head Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: The Darkflame Lance leaves behind a lingering miasma of Dark Magic, shrouding the battlefield in a veil of despair. Those who dare to stand against its malevolent power find themselves ensnared in its grasp, their wills weakened and their resolve shattered by the relentless onslaught of the bleak magic of Furion.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: Too long has the perfidy of the "High" Elves stood unchallenged. With Furion by his side, Malekith will once more reclaim Ulthuan and set right all of the wrongs that have been done to the Dark Elves.

effects.description: Leadership: +12 when fighting against High Elves
Weapon strength: +20% when fighting against High Elves
Double experience gain for units when fighting against High Elves

skillTree.localised_description: So much of war is an art. Over time and with much practice, combat moves can resemble a series of perfectly-rehearsed dance moves.
There is nothing but utter belief. There is no reasoning with this one.
"Don't look into their eyes, there is only death there!"
Such is this one's conviction that others have no choice but to believe.
Speaking words of power or faith can alter perceptions on the battlefield.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
An omen, a sign - this being knows things and any who follow will share their glory.
This one will not go down easily - it will be necessary to break both the will and the body first.
This one fights with a fervour to be both admired and despised.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

target_if: Not on or below a platform
Not on or below a platform

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

items.colour_text: Carved from the tortured heartstone of a mountain drenched in Dark Magic, the Black Amulet is a lustrous polished stone of midnight hue. It is engraved with a single glowing rune, and into its ebony facets have been poured all the captured malice and spite that emanates from the chill lands of Naggaroth. To behold its darksome shape is to see despair made physical, it is to abandon even the merest memory of hope.
Made by Furion for his own brow, the Crown of Black Iron captures Dark Magic and oozes a daemonic shadow that protects the wearer.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve: +10 per turn

ui_effects.localised_text: Explosion does not affect friendly troops

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
If this unit can hide at its current location it will not be spotted until the enemy is very close.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Under the ruthless tyrant Imrik, known as Caledor, those now called the "High" Elves invaded Nagarythe and forced them to defend themselves. Many who saw the righteousness of Malekith's cause joined him, but the hordes of the usurper outnumbered them and after seven great battles that ended in Malekith's victory, he was defeated through treachery at the Marshes of Maledor. It is the memory of those times, the corrupt betrayal of those who should have been kin, that spurs Furion onwards.

effects.description:
Enemy leadership: -8 for High Elven units
	(enemy armies in local province)

Enemy vigour loss reduction: +66% for High Elven units
	(enemy armies in local province)
